hero.title: Premium Arabic Gum from East Africa
hero.subtitle: Arabic Gum, redefined: clean sourcing, tight specs, and a finish your customers can trust.

commitment.desc: Direct origin, lab-verified, globally compliant. Short supply chain, long-term trust.

sourced.title: Sourced at Origin
sourced.body: Direct relationships with producers ensure authenticity and consistency.

lab.title: Lab Verified
lab.body: COAs match independent labs; specs hold under scrutiny.

industry.title: Industry Ready
industry.body: Aligned to ISO/GMP workflows with documentation on tap.

featured.desc: Tight specs. Clean aroma. Documentation ready.

testimonials.title: Clients, on the record
testimonials.desc: Quiet consistency wins. A few words from teams who ship with us.

items.quote: Arabic Gum quality is relentlessly stable. COAs match our lab, batch after batch.
items.who: Head of QA, Food Ingredients Inc.

items.quote: Documentation is tight; logistics were spot-on. Zero drama. Ideal vendor.
Frankincense & Myrrh quality elevated our line. Customers noticed—so did sales.

cta.title: Need consistent, certified Arabic Gum & resins?
cta.desc: Ask for grade sheets, COA/SDS, and sample kits. We’ll match specs to your process.

hero.title: A legacy of
hero.subtitle: Premium natural gum resins from East Africa — direct from origin, audit-ready quality, and precision logistics.

origin.title: Direct from Origin
origin.body: We partner closely with collectors and processors across Sudan, Somalia, and Ethiopia. Short supply lines. Lot-level documentation. Better economics for producers — and consistency for buyers.

quality.title: Driven by Quality
quality.body: Every lot is screened, graded, and verified. COA/SDS on request. Our QA process is designed to pass audits and keep your supply chain predictable.

labChecks.title: Lab Checks
labChecks.body: Moisture, impurities, optical, and solubility checks per lot.

traceability.title: Traceability
traceability.body: Lot-level docs link back to the producing region.

consistency.title: Consistency
consistency.body: Tight specs and repeatable results for scale.

logistics.title: Reliable Logistics
logistics.body: From packing specs to Incoterms, we manage the path from farmgate to forwarder. Predictable lead times. Transparent communication. Fewer surprises.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Deliver world-class natural gum resins through sustainable sourcing, tight specs, and lot-level documentation — empowering communities.

vision.title: Vision
vision.body: Be the most dependable East African partner for Arabic Gum and allied resins, known for traceability, speed, and consistency.

values.title: Values
list: Quality that stands up to audits

company.title: A Glimpse of Our Company
company.body: EAST is a premier exporter and trader of natural gum resins — Arabic Gum (grades 1 & 2), Myrrh, Opoponax, and Frankincense. With offices in Nairobi, Kenya, and Juba, South Sudan, we are committed to providing exceptional quality products globally.

cta.title: Ready to start the journey with us?
cta.body: Request grade sheets, COA/SDS, and sample kits.

hero.title: Quality &
hero.subtitle: We partner directly with trusted collectors across Sudan, Somalia, and Ethiopia, ensuring every resin is harvested responsibly with respect to the environment and local communities.

items.title: Grading Discipline
items.desc: Visual & size grading at origin with calibrated references; lot-level separation.

items.title: Moisture Control
items.desc: Target ranges per product; sealed storage; moisture re-check pre-export.

items.title: Impurity Limits
items.desc: Foreign matter thresholds set per spec; double-pass cleaning for sensitive grades.

items.title: Documentation
items.desc: COA/SDS on request, packing lists, HS codes, and traceability down to producing region.

items.title: Food Safety Mindset
items.desc: Hygienic handling, pest control routines, and container inspection checklists.

items.title: Regulatory Fit
items.desc: HS, country-of-origin proofs, and certificates aligned to destination requirements.

steps.d: Partner collectors harvest and pre-clean; initial visual grading.
Size/color sorting, removal of impurities, preliminary moisture checks.
Moisture, insolubles/impurities, appearance; retain sample archived.
Packaging per spec (25 kg / jumbo). Seals & labels applied; palletization.
COA/SDS (if requested), packing list, invoice, HS code, origin proofs.
Container inspection checklist; handoff to forwarder; status updates.

assurance.title: Assurance Metrics
assurance.body: We operate with documented processes, data logging, and corrective action loops to maintain consistency at scale.

docsSampling.title: Representative Samples & Lot Docs
points: Retain samples archived per lot; photographed and labeled.
COA/SDS provided on request; parameters aligned to buyer specs.
Packing specs, pallets, seals, and container checklist archived.

cta.title: Need grade sheets or QA alignment?
cta.body: Share your parameters; we’ll confirm feasibility and timelines.

hero.subtitle: Premium Arabic Gum, Myrrh, Opoponax, and Frankincense — curated at origin, graded with discipline, delivered with precision.
